amendment.description: Amendment facilitates the supply of domestic aggregate for nationally significant freight and highway projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to facilitate the supply of domestic aggregate for nationally significant freight and highway projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Hunter to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
